document_data.mainbody:
Ascloakans Fine Inn was a large inn located in the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the 15 century DR.
Ascloakans Fine Inn stood at the beginning of the curving Talankars Lane and Hammaskarls Ride, just across from the citys easternmost gate â€“ the Basilisk Gate. It was located next-door to The Fools Altar, a shrine to Finder Wyvernspur.
